ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Upgrade it into Ring of Basilius as soon as possible.
ItemTooltips.branches: Will be used to make magic wand and then magic ward!
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Only use it when u have 10 or more charges! or when u need that little bit of mana for crucial spell.
ItemTooltips.courier: Buy it if u have one support in your team to help out then let them upgrade it into a flying currier.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Use these instead of Arcane Boots later in game if needed.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: If you want to buy it do it but before 10min mark.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Gives bonus damage and lifesteal to all units around you it's also nice for helping out your melee carry.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Toggle off it until level 6 you don't need to push yet, also your golem will get extra +2 armor.
ItemTooltips.pipe:
If other support want's to Build Mekansm you should allways build up pipe.

Use it right before a fight to block initial spell damage from enemy team.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: The disable it offers is handy in almost all situations, making chasing, escaping or even initiating a teamfight much easier.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon:
Requires good use of micro skills to be most effective not recommended for new players!

Level 3 gives you true sight for 35sec or until unit dies and does nice amount of damage.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter:
Don't think about reduced golem stats strength is in numbers and their abilities stack!
Try to attack same target with both golems at same time, when Flaming Fists proc it will destroy your target. It also goes through magic immmune effects.
ItemTooltips.refresher:
You don't have to activate it instantly when you cast ultimate, save it until first one expire so u can stay and fight longer.

Or use it right after ult so u can have 4 golems by the time your ult is ready refresher will be to it's up for you to decide!
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: makes you harder to kill and gives a lot of mana. Its ability is perfect for teamfights.
ItemTooltips.hood_of_defiance:
If your support doesn't want to make it you should build this item right after Scepter.

Will be used later to make Pipe of Insight.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Use it close to your allies when they lack mana to help out.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Nice to have if your team has huge AOE spells.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots:
Get these only if u are getting harrased in lane.

Disassemble it to make Arcane Boots after you decide to push.

Otherwise get Arcane Boots!.

AbilityTooltips.warlock_fatal_bonds:
Use it after you upgrade it twice to harras enemy heroes especialy their carry's.

Note: Target enemy hero if they are close to their creep wave.   

Cast this spell right before you cast your ultimate if possible and if not use it asap after ultimate for maximum effect.
AbilityTooltips.warlock_shadow_word: Use it only to heal your allies when they have no potions or when you see they are being focused by enemy for kill, or to ensure first blood!
AbilityTooltips.warlock_upheaval: Use it to slow down enemy push or right after your ultimate.
AbilityTooltips.warlock_rain_of_chaos: Try to use it on 3 or more enemy targets for maximum effect.
